name: part_006
file: tmp_【#冥ハロ2025】白上フブキ生誕３DLIVE「冥界Halloween Night!」【白上フブキ⧸ホロライブ】 [7Tm7dVsTPBk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: A narrative introduction with stylized animation about a cursed girl.
Performance of the song 'Apple-Selling Ephemeral Girl'.
scenes.song_name: Apple-Selling Ephemeral Girl (林檎売りの泡沫少女)

subtitles.original: 死の呪いがかけられた少女のお話
subtitles.english: The story of a girl who was cursed with death.

subtitles.original: 林檎売りの泡沫少女
subtitles.english: Apple-Selling Ephemeral Girl

subtitles.original: 遠い遠い時の果て
subtitles.english: At the end of a long, long time

subtitles.original: そこに住まう人は皆
subtitles.english: Everyone who lives there

subtitles.original: 永遠の命を持つ
subtitles.english: Possesses eternal life

subtitles.original: 世界での話
subtitles.english: This is a story of that world

subtitles.original: 赤い実の成る木の下
subtitles.english: Under the tree that bears red fruit

subtitles.original: La La Lu La 生まれながらに
subtitles.english: La La Lu La, from the moment of birth

subtitles.original: 死の呪いがかけられた
subtitles.english: Cursed with death

subtitles.original: 少女の話
subtitles.english: The story of a girl

subtitles.original: 色付いた街外れ
subtitles.english: In the colorful outskirts of town

subtitles.original: 蒼く光る湖畔
subtitles.english: By the blue-glowing lakeside

subtitles.original: 赤い実のお菓子屋
subtitles.english: Is a candy shop of red fruit

subtitles.original: ちょっぴり寒くなった今日は
subtitles.english: Today, it's gotten a bit cold

subtitles.original: 妙に誇らしげ
subtitles.english: She seems strangely proud

subtitles.original: 自信作を売りにゆく
subtitles.english: Going to sell her masterpiece

subtitles.original: 待ってて 今度こそ
subtitles.english: Wait for me, this time for sure

subtitles.original: 美味しいんだから
subtitles.english: Because it's delicious

subtitles.original: 時計塔の見える市場
subtitles.english: In the market with the clock tower

subtitles.original: 驚いた 珍しく賑やかだね
subtitles.english: I'm surprised, it's unusually lively

subtitles.original: La La Lu La Lucky!!
subtitles.english: La La Lu La Lucky!!

subtitles.original: 物憂げな街の隅 ひとり
subtitles.english: Alone in a melancholy corner of town

subtitles.original: 赤い実のパイはどうですか
subtitles.english: How about a red fruit pie?

subtitles.original: 自信作なの そんなの
subtitles.english: It's my masterpiece, but something like that

subtitles.original: ひとつも売れないさ
subtitles.english: Not a single one will sell

subtitles.original: 少女を見て蔑む人たち
subtitles.english: The people look at the girl with disdain

subtitles.original: 「みんなと何も変わらないのに」
subtitles.english: "Even though I'm no different from anyone else"

subtitles.original: 美味しくできたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I made it so delicious

subtitles.original: 今日も声は届かないので
subtitles.english: My voice doesn't reach them today either, so

subtitles.original: まるで透明になったみたいだわ
subtitles.english: It's like I've become transparent

subtitles.original: そうして誰もが知らぬふりをした
subtitles.english: And so, everyone pretended not to know

subtitles.original: 何故なら少女は呪われているから
subtitles.english: Because the girl is cursed

subtitles.original: 死んだ世界でただひとり生きていた
subtitles.english: She lived all alone in a dead world

subtitles.original: 少女の話
subtitles.english: The story of a girl

subtitles.original: 夜なべでアレンジパイと
subtitles.english: Working through the night on an arranged pie

subtitles.original: にっこりスマイル引っさげ
subtitles.english: With a beaming smile in tow

subtitles.original: 少女はまた諦めない
subtitles.english: The girl won't give up again

subtitles.original: 時計塔の針も空を指して
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock tower point to the sky

subtitles.original: お腹も鳴るそんな時
subtitles.english: And her stomach growls at such a time

subtitles.original: ふと後ろから人が少女を押す
subtitles.english: Suddenly, someone pushes the girl from behind

subtitles.original: 甘い籠は落ちる
subtitles.english: The sweet basket falls

subtitles.original: お菓子を踏み行く人たち
subtitles.english: People step on the sweets as they go

subtitles.original: 平気な顔をしてさ
subtitles.english: With indifferent faces

subtitles.original: 惨め拾い集める
subtitles.english: She gathers the fragments miserably

subtitles.original: ふともうひとりの手が
subtitles.english: Suddenly, another person's hand...

subtitles.original: ドロドロのパイを頬に口に入れて
subtitles.english: Puts the messy pie into their mouth

subtitles.original: 「美味しいね」
subtitles.english: "It's delicious"

subtitles.original: その声で心は溢れた
subtitles.english: With those words, her heart overflowed

subtitles.original: まるで輪郭を描いたみたいだわ
subtitles.english: It's like an outline has been drawn

subtitles.original: そうして彼は手を差し出した
subtitles.english: And so, he reached out his hand

subtitles.original: 何故なら少女に呪われているから?
subtitles.english: Is it because he's cursed by the girl?

subtitles.original: 死んだ世界で運命ふたり生きていた
subtitles.english: Two destined souls lived in a dead world

subtitles.original: 遠い物語
subtitles.english: A distant story

subtitles.original: 街の人達は哀れむ
subtitles.english: The people of the town feel pity

subtitles.original: 赤い実を食べて呪われた者を
subtitles.english: For the one who ate the red fruit and was cursed

subtitles.original: 「永遠に生きられずに死ぬのさ」
subtitles.english: "They'll die without being able to live forever"

subtitles.original: 嘯いて なんて可哀想な話
subtitles.english: They boast; what a pitiful story

subtitles.original: ふたりは笑う それでも笑う
subtitles.english: The two of them laugh, they laugh anyway

subtitles.original: La La La とっても素敵な呪いで
subtitles.english: La La Lu La, with a very wonderful curse

subtitles.original: たとえ明日死んでも
subtitles.english: Even if they die tomorrow

subtitles.original: 今が確かで大切になるから
subtitles.english: Because the present becomes certain and precious

subtitles.original: もう声は届かないので
subtitles.english: The voice no longer reaches anyone, so

subtitles.original: まるで透明になったみたいだわ
subtitles.english: It's like I've become transparent

subtitles.original: そうして誰もが知らぬふりをした
subtitles.english: And so, everyone pretended not to know

subtitles.original: 何故なら世界が呪われているから
subtitles.english: Because the world is cursed

subtitles.original: 『永遠』の呪いは解かれていた
subtitles.english: The curse of "eternity" had been broken

subtitles.original: まるでふたりの方が狂ったみたいだわ
subtitles.english: It's like the two of them were the ones who went mad
